SCTX - Script Source:
scn mwDAMalacathStatueScript

short speech
float timer

begin onactivate

	if GetStage fbmwDAMalacath < 10
		if GetPCIsRace Orc == 1
			set speech to 1
		else
			set speech to -1
		endif
	elseif GetStage fbmwDAMalacath == 60
		set speech to 4
	endif

end

begin gamemode

	if GetStage fbmwDAMalacath >= 70
		return
	endif

	set timer to ( timer - GetSecondsPassed )

	if timer <= 0
		if GetStage fbmwDAMalacath < 10
			if speech == 1
				DisablePlayerControls
				set timer to mwDAMalacathStatueREF.Say mwDAMalacathSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 2
			elseif speech == 2
				set timer to mwDAMalacathStatueREF.Say mwDAMalacathSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 3
			elseif speech == -1
				DisablePlayerControls
				set timer to mwDAMalacathStatueREF.Say mwDAMalacathSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to -2
			elseif speech == -2
				set timer to mwDAMalacathStatueREF.Say mwDAMalacathSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 3
			elseif speech == 3
				EnablePlayerControls
				SetStage fbmwdamalacath 10
				AddTopic 1oreynsbearclaw
				AddTopic 1kharagsgrotkhar
			endif
		elseif GetStage fbmwDAMalacath == 60
			if speech == 4
				DisablePlayerControls
				set timer to mwDAMalacathStatueREF.Say mwDAMalacathSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 5
			elseif speech == 5
				set timer to mwDAMalacathStatueREF.Say mwDAMalacathSpeech 1 mwDaedricSpeaker 1
				set speech to 6
			elseif speech == 6
				EnablePlayerControls
				player.AddItem 0helmubearclawuunique 1
				SetStage fbmwdamalacath 70
			endif
		endif
	endif
end
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 1572 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
